text: Hi all  I‚Äôm pretty new here so I‚Äôm not sure if this has been discussed. I notice that UOB PRVI miles card have pretty good miles per dollar spent ($1.4mpd for local spend)  but I don‚Äôt see many posts or talks about this card. Is there any advice on this? üòä
People here are more interested in 4mpd  6mpd to 10mpd.
1.4 mpd is only good if u max out every card that u have
You should also notice1  5 dollar earn block  which means if you spend 9.9 dollars then it will be less than 1 mpd;2  uob merchant;3  uni$ round down
Just confirmed with webull new sign up 8.4%Only if u buy into the USD fund.SGD will not get üòî
And other entry general miles cards have benefits like free lounge passes  without UOB shenanigans
